duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain partnerships with grocery store managers to sell the best brands in the bakery industry.
Support the execution of DSDE best practices by training/onboarding and developing Route Sales Professionals and Independent Business Partners.
Leverage data and technology to develop/execute sales plans and win as a team in the marketplace.
Be part of a team in an extraordinary organization where you can bring your authentic self to work each and every day.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
